books.author: by Jack Carr
books.description: The fifth book in the Terminal List series. James Reece goes after the killer of a Mossad operative attached to the C.I.A.
books.name: IN THE BLOOD

books.author: by Emily Henry
books.description: While on vacation in North Carolina, a literary agent keeps running into an editor.
books.name: BOOK LOVERS

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.name: UGLY LOVE

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: The 22nd book in the Women’s Murder Club series. Lindsay Boxer returns as word gets around about a shipment of drugs and weapons.
books.name: 22 SECONDS

books.author: by Emma Straub
books.description: A 40-year-old woman finds new meaning in past events when she goes back in time and relives her 16th birthday in 1996.
books.name: THIS TIME TOMORROW

books.author: by Emily Henry
books.description: Opposites Poppy and Alex meet to vacation together one more time in hopes of saving their relationship.
books.name: PEOPLE WE MEET ON VACATION

books.author: by Christina Lauren
books.description: Lily and Leo must decide how much they will risk in pursuit of love and treasure in the red rock canyons of Utah.
books.name: SOMETHING WILDER

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The third book in the Archer series. Archer, Dash and Callahan search for a missing screenwriter who had a dead body turn up in her home.
books.name: DREAM TOWN

books.author: by Jennifer Weiner
books.description: A wedding between Ruby Danhauser and her pandemic boyfriend at a family beach house in Cape Cod brings to light family secrets.
books.name: THE SUMMER PLACE

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: An epic party has serious outcomes for four famous siblings.
books.name: MALIBU RISING

books.author: by Lee Child and Andrew Child
books.description: The 26th book in the Jack Reacher series. Reacher helps an F.B.I. agent look for her missing brother and takes on a foe named Dendoncker.
books.name: BETTER OFF DEAD
